games.chess

Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • joueur.BaseGameObject
      • games.chess.GameObject
        • games.chess.Piece

  • public class Piece
extends GameObject
    A chess piece.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean captured
      When the Piece has been captured (removed from the board) this is true.
      java.lang.String file
      The file (column) coordinate of the Piece represented as a letter [a-h], with 'a' starting at the left of the board.
      boolean hasMoved
      If the Piece has moved from its starting position.
      Player owner
      The player that controls this chess Piece.
      int rank
      The rank (row) coordinate of the Piece represented as a number [1-8], with 1 starting at the bottom of the board.
      java.lang.String type
      The type of chess Piece this is, either: 'King', 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', 'Bishop', or 'Pawn'.

    • Field Detail

      • captured

        public boolean captured
        When the Piece has been captured (removed from the board) this is true. Otherwise false.

      • file

        public java.lang.String file
        The file (column) coordinate of the Piece represented as a letter [a-h], with 'a' starting at the left of the board.

      • hasMoved

        public boolean hasMoved
        If the Piece has moved from its starting position.

      • owner

        public Player owner
        The player that controls this chess Piece.

      • rank

        public int rank
        The rank (row) coordinate of the Piece represented as a number [1-8], with 1 starting at the bottom of the board.

      • type

        public java.lang.String type
        The type of chess Piece this is, either: 'King', 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', 'Bishop', or 'Pawn'.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public Move move(java.lang.String file,
                 int rank)
        Defaults the value for the optional arg 'promotionType' to '""'
        See Also:
        move(String, int, String)

      • move

        public Move move(java.lang.String file,
                 int rank,
                 java.lang.String promotionType)
        Moves the Piece from its current location to the given rank and file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file coordinate to move to. Must be [a-h].
        rank - The rank coordinate to move to. Must be [1-8].
        promotionType - If this is a Pawn moving to the end of the board then this parameter is what to promote it to. When used must be 'Queen', 'Knight', 'Rook', or 'Bishop'.
        Returns:
        The Move you did if successful, otherwise null if invalid. In addition if your move was invalid you will lose.
